casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana, BY AND THROUGH Its Attorney General James CALDWELL
v.
FOURNIER INDUSTRIE ET SANTE and Laboratories Fournier, S.A., Abbott Laboratories, AbbVie, Inc. NO. 2018-C-2065 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 8, 2019 Denied. HUGHES, J., would grant.

GENOVESE, J., would grant.
